breakthroughs.speaker: Nathalie Nebelius (Cordinata AB)
breakthroughs.text: So lovely. to see you all again. It's been a month, even though I think I've seen most of you online or in person since we met in Tuscany.

breakthroughs.speaker: Alex Alegria (metalucks.com)
breakthroughs.text: Under the light of awakening, we walk with trust in the unfolding intelligence of life. We devote ourselves to regeneration, restoring the fabric of earth and the essence of humanity. We know that collaboration is the true architecture of evolution, where unity becomes strength, and diversity becomes harmony. We choose love as our compass, and integrity as our plan. We honor coherence, weaving finance, technology, and governance into service of life itself. We uphold well-being as our prime directive, the measure of prosperity, and the essence of all enterprise. We embody courage, walking boldly through uncertainty, guided by vision and conviction. the of the world begins within. We declare our task to be that of planetary regeneration.

breakthroughs.speaker: Alex Alegria (metalucks.com)
breakthroughs.text: So the purpose is our intention, is our collective intention, is why we got here all together. And, and that is that collective intention, but the vision, where are we going with this, a regenerative planetary civilization, where human purpose, finance, and technology unite in service to life itself. And how are we going to get there? This is our mission. By catalyzing humanity transition to regenerative civilization, by building integrated financial, digital, physical, and cultural infrastructure, that enables coherent and collective action at a planetary scale. So integrating financial, digital, physical, and cultural infrastructure. And that's our way of getting to that vision. And I hope this vision, this purpose. know. it this purpose. is inspiring enough for us collectively to take this action forward. Thank you.

This basically is just taking some of the founders or the legal directors of some of the entities within the MBS who came part of the anchor circle. The idea is within the next six months, once we have the new governance charter adopted, we will put in place a new sociocratic election process. Just for now, the intention of this is to get the ball rolling. Base is the provisional anchor circle.

Because if anybody on this call says that I know exactly all the steps that we need to walk in the next six months or next one year or whatever it is, that's not true because nobody does. And we know that we will face challenges and uncertainties, and we have to figure it out, including how to work together and how we align internally.

And a lot of things even, like, probably planned for the literally next hundred days might be overkill and need to be scaled down to be, like, way more realistic. actions.speaker: Team Metaluck
actions.text: Post creed/values deck to Symbiosis General Hub

actions.speaker: Nathalie Nebelius (Cordinata AB)
actions.text: Post questions/discussion points in Symbiosis General Hub

actions.speaker: Nathalie Nebelius (Cordinata AB)
actions.text: Send bi-weekly Anchor Circle updates to ecosystem

actions.speaker: Christopher Herghelegiu
actions.text: Post Anchor Circle updates to Symbiosis after each meeting

actions.speaker: Sudheer
actions.text: Schedule 3–4h MVS integration & tech infrastructure alignment call w/ relevant leads

decisions.speaker: Sudheer
decisions.text: The vision, mission, and the creed that Shyamana just beautifully read out were kind of formally adopted as the underlying basis for Better World. The core values also were finalized.

decisions.speaker: Sudheer
decisions.text: A provisional anchor circle was formed, and I want to highlight the word provisional. This basically is just taking some of the founders or the legal directors of some of the entities within the MBS who came part of the anchor circle.

decisions.speaker: Sudheer
decisions.text: Farhad brought to the table that we should update the corporate structure, what Alex had presented at the gathering, to also create another separate legal entity that we are calling as Better World Private Equity Limited.

decisions.speaker: Sudheer
decisions.text: The Anchor Circle said that we'd rather start using what we've built.

decisions.speaker: Sudheer
decisions.text: We agreed that while the product is in an alpha stage, we can at least still start using some parts of it. So that's why that was formally agreed that let's at least start getting the circles up there, put all the documents there.

decisions.speaker: Sudheer
decisions.text: The legal sub-circle charter was adopted and approved by the anchor circle, with IRS agreeing to take the lead on this.

decisions.speaker: Sudheer
decisions.text: We also voted on the purpose through Symbiosis, so I think it worked, even though people struggled a bit to understand how to use it.

decisions.speaker: Alex Alegria (metalucks.com)
decisions.text: So, we decided, okay, well, we will postpone or delay that integration. And therefore, Anastasia decided that it's not the right time to put her energy and time into this.

recommendations.text: Implement clear roles and responsibilities within each circle to enable more distributed participation and workload sharing. This will address the current frustration around parallel work streams and unclear contribution pathways.

Enhance communication channels and transparency, especially regarding Anchor Circle updates and decisions. Utilizing Symbiosis for posting meeting summaries, initiatives, and challenges will allow the collective to identify opportunities for contribution and foster a stronger sense of involvement.

Prioritize the 'MVS integration & tech infrastructure alignment call' to address overlapping functionalities and leverage existing resources more effectively. This will clarify the value proposition and optimize capital and team efforts.

Develop a framework for compensation and value attribution for time and effort spent by all contributors. This will provide clarity and ensure financial alignment with the collective's values, fostering a more inclusive and equitable environment.

Address the definition and practical application of 'regeneration' within the ecosystem. Establishing a common understanding of what it is and isn't, and how it informs decision-making, will strengthen collective alignment and intentionality.

Continue to foster an environment that encourages open dialogue and constructive feedback, especially when discussing governance and operational decisions. This will help distribute power more effectively and ensure decisions are made in the best interest of the group, not solely by the 'inner circle'.

Maintain focus on the core values of trust, transparency, and courage, especially during periods of uncertainty and operational challenges. Regularly reiterating these values will help mitigate friction and reinforce the collective's shared purpose.
